    • Uses of Updatable in com.revivedstandards.handlers

      Classes in com.revivedstandards.handlers that implement Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StandardCollisionHandler
      StandardCollisionHandler uses preset StandardIDs to determine what should happen when a collision between two ID's occurs.
      class  StandardHandler
      The StandardHandler class houses all entities/objects within the game.
      class  StandardParticleHandler
      StandardParticleHandler is, as the name suggests, a handler for StandardParticle objects.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StandardCamera
      A camera will follow an object in the game.

      This class represents a standard box particle.
      class  StandardDragParticle

      class  StandardLevel

      class  StandardTrail
      Renders a translucent trail behind the supplied StandardGameObject.

    • Uses of Updatable in com.revivedstandards.test

      Classes in com.revivedstandards.test that implement Updatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RainController
      RainController will spawn different rain (blue) particles if it is raining in the location provided by the user.
      class  SpaceLevel
      Demonstrates the concept of a very primitive level using the Standards API.
      class  UserInterface
      This class shows how to render text and other elements on the screen.
